name: Ismail H. Toroslu
content: Dr. Ismail Hakki Toroslu METU Department of Computer Engineering Dr. Ismail Hakki Toroslu Title: Professor Education: Ph.D. Computer Science, Northwestern University, 1993 M.S. Computer Engineering, Bilkent University, 1989 B.S. Computer Engineering, METU, 1987 Research Topics: Databases - Data Mining, Machine Learning Algorithms - Graph Algorithms Logic -  Logic Programming Teaching: CENG 315 - Algorithms CENG 316 - Practice on Algorithms CENG 242 - Programming Language Concepts CENG 280 - Formal Languages and Abstract Machines CENG 550 - Logic and Databases CENG 546 - Object Oriented Programming CENG 567 - Design and Analysis of Algorithms Office: Address: Department of Computer Engineering, METU, 06800 Ankara TURKEY Office: BMB-I  #309 Phone: +90-312-210-5585 Fax: +90-312-210-5544 E-mail Address: toroslu[at]ceng.metu.edu.tr
